an1.235-247:1.1: “The foremost of my nun disciples in seniority is Mahāpajāpatī Gotamī.
an1.235-247:4.1: … who have memorized the texts on monastic training is Paṭācārā.
an1.235-247:5.1: … who speak on the teaching is Dhammadinnā.
an1.235-247:9.1: … with swift insight is Bhaddā Kuṇḍalakesā.
an1.235-247:10.1: … who recollect past lives is Bhaddā Kāpilānī.
an1.235-247:11.1: … who have attained great insight is Bhaddakaccānā.
an1.235-247:12.1: … who wear coarse robes is Kisāgotamī.
an1.235-247:13.1: … who are strong in faith is Siṅgālakamātā.”
